TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewDeletedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件都将引发事件的删除按钮时 (带按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Delete") 在控件内单击时，但之后控件中删除记录。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but after the control deletes the record. 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如检查删除操作的结果，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of a delete operation, whenever this event occurs. A对象传递给事件处理方法，可用于确定受影响的记录和任何可能发生的异常数。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定删除操作所影响的记录数，请使用属性。To determine the number of records affected by the delete operation, use the property. 使用属性以确定是否发生任何异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常的事件处理方法中通过设置属性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果删除操作过程中发生异常和属性设置为`false`、控件重新引发的异常。If an exception occurs during the delete operation and the property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 如果你想要访问的键字段和非键字段的已删除的记录的名称/值对，使用和属性，分别。If you want to access the name/value pairs of the key fields and non-key fields of the deleted record, use the and properties, respectively. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象传递到事件处理方法事件，以确定是否在删除操作期间发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/gridviewdeletedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/gridviewdeletedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The number of rows affected by the delete operation.

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 ，表示在执行删除操作时引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception raised when the delete operation was performed.

param.span: 如果未引发异常，则将 用于此参数。

span.span: If no exception is raised, use for this parameter.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||对象中包含`e`参数。The object contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 在引发事件时，将主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取受删除操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by the delete operation.

value.span: 受删除操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定的删除操作所影响的记录数。Use the property to determine the number of records affected by the delete operation. 此属性通常用于验证在以下情况下删除了正确的记录数：This property is commonly used to verify that the correct number of records was deleted in the following situations: - 确认只有单个记录已删除。Verify that only a single record was deleted. 有时编写不当的 delete 语句可能会删除多个记录。Sometimes an improperly written delete statement can delete multiple records. - 验证在不会引发异常的删除操作期间发生错误时删除了记录。Verify that a record was deleted when an error occurs during the delete operation that does not raise an exception. - 确认是否支持开放式并发的数据源控件时，已删除记录 (如和控件) 具有其属性设置为`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`枚举值。Verify that a record was deleted when a data source control that supports optimistic concurrency (such as the and controls) has its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value. 在此设置，可能不会删除已被另一个用户同时修改的记录。Under this setting, a record that has been modified by another user concurrently might not be deleted. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以验证在删除操作期间记录已被删除。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to verify that a record was deleted during the delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/gridviewdeletedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/gridviewdeletedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在删除操作过程中引发的异常（如果引发）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the delete operation.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示删除操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception that was raised during the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以确定删除操作过程中引发的异常。Use the property to determine the exception that was raised during the delete operation. 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发了异常，并且你决定要处理的事件处理程序中的异常，请务必设置属性`true`; 否则为控件重新引发的异常。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the control re-throws the exception. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否在删除操作期间发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/gridviewdeletedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/gridviewdeletedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在事件处理程序中处理了删除操作中引发的异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the delete operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当执行删除操作期间引发了异常时，则使用属性以指示是否处理了该异常在事件处理程序。When an exception is raised during the delete operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 当此属性设置为`true`，将异常认为是进行处理并且不会重新引发。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown. 如果此属性设置为`false`、控件重新引发的异常。If this property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要确定引发哪个异常，请使用属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以指示是否处理了该异常在事件处理程序。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/gridviewdeletedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/gridviewdeletedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取已删除记录的键字段名/值对的排序字典。

span.span: Gets an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.

value.span: 包含已删除记录的键字段名称/值对的顺序字典的 。

span.span: A that contains an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问的键字段的值 (所指定的属性) 的已删除的记录。Use the property to access the values of the key fields (as specified by the property) for a deleted record. 例如，可以使用这些值来记录已删除的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted records. > [!NOTE] > 此属性包含仅的键字段。This property contains only the key fields. 若要访问非键字段，请使用属性。To access the non-key fields, use the property. 属性返回的对象实现接口。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示已删除的记录的键字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the key fields of the deleted record. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来访问已删除的记录的键字段的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the key fields for a deleted record. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/CS/gridviewdeletedeventargskeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/VB/gridviewdeletedeventargskeysvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取包含已删除记录所对应的非键字段名称/值对的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.

value.span: 包含已删除记录的非键字段名称/值对的字典的 。

span.span: A that contains a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the deleted record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问已删除的记录的非键字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted record. 例如，可以使用这些值来记录已删除的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted records. > [!NOTE] > 仅当在项模板中使用双向绑定表达式时填充属性。The property is populated only when two-way binding expressions are used in the item template. 双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). 属性返回的对象实现接口。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示已删除的记录的非键字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the non-key fields of the deleted record. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不包含的键字段 (所指定的属性) 的已删除的记录。This property does not contain the key fields (as specified by the property) for the deleted record. 若要访问的键字段，请使用属性。To access the key fields, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来访问已删除的记录的非键字段的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted record. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/CS/gridviewdeletedeventargskeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/VB/gridviewdeletedeventargskeysvb.aspx#1)]
